subject: Boxing
Soccer
Bicycles and Bicycling
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Preparations continued for the heavyweight championship fight between Dereck Chisora and Vitali Klitschko in Munich, and cyclists completed the second stage of the Tour of Oman.
snippet: Preparations continued for the heavyweight championship fight between Dereck Chisora and Vitali Klitschko in Munich, and cyclists completed the second stage of the Tour of Oman.
